title: Technical Support Engineer
content:
주요 업무
                    [English Resume is required! 영문 이력서로 보내주세요!]Consistent testing and quality assurance support of 3D computer vision software

업무 관련 기술 / 활동 분야
        
          네트워크관리
          리눅스
          ROS : robot operating system

채용 상세
                    [Responsibilities]- Consistent testing and quality assurance support of 3D computer vision software- Data collection and sensor hardware management support- Technical support at customer/conferenc…
            더 보기
            [Responsibilities]- Consistent testing and quality assurance support of 3D computer vision software- Data collection and sensor hardware management support- Technical support at customer/conference sites[Qualification]- Bachelors’s degree in Computer Science, Electric Engineering, Mechanical Engineering or equivalent experience- Experience in Linux and command-line environment- Experience in network system (TCP/IP, Wi-fi and etc.) management[Preferences]- Experience in Robot Operating System (ROS)- Experience in software testing- Experience in on-site technical support
